personal.name: Bogdan Circiu
personal.bio: Computer Science graduate and AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate. Working knowledge of Java, Spring Boot, Python, SQL, and React. Hands-on exposure with AWS services including S3, CloudFront, Route53, DynamoDB, Elastic Beanstalk, Lambda, and API Gateway, as well as CI/CD workflows and Git. Seeking entry-level positions in software development, with a particular interest in DevOps, cloud engineering, and AWS. Currently learning Terraform, Docker, and Kubernetes.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with real-time inventory management, payment processing, and an admin dashboard.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management tool with drag-and-drop boards, real-time updates, and team workspaces.

projects.title: Client Appointment Tracker
projects.description: A Java application designed with a flexible architecture supporting multiple data storage backends (text files, binary files, SQL database), runtime configurability, and comprehensive CRUD operations for Patient and Appointment entities with real-world constraints like non-overlapping appointments. Includes dual user interfaces: a JavaFX GUI and a CLI.

projects.title: Library Management System
projects.description: A robust Python-based Library Management System with a layered architecture for efficient handling of book and client records. Features include unit tests for reliability and user-friendly book rental and return functionality.
